methods.Synopsis: Top News feeds reflect the editorial priotization of our newsroom, mirroring the story hiearchy of the USA TODAY website.

parameters.Name: section
parameters.Description: Section of news.

parameters.Name: tag
parameters.Description: Find articles based on embedded keywords.

parameters.Name: search
parameters.Description: Find articles based on a USA TODAY text search query.

parameters.Name: count
parameters.Description: Use this value to set the number of incoming stories. (default is 10)

parameters.Name: days
parameters.Description: Returns stories that are no older than X days old, where X equals the input value.

parameters.Name: page
parameters.Description: Returns the Xth page of results, where X equals the input value.

parameters.Name: reporter
parameters.Description: Returns only stories from a specific reporter. Query searches byline field.

parameters.Name: source
parameters.Description: Returns only stories from a specific news source.

parameters.Name: tickersonly
parameters.Description: When set to Y, returns only stories with embedded stock values. Best used with Money stories.

parameters.Name: encoding
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

parameters.Name: jsoncallbackmethod
parameters.Description: Sets the JSON callback method. Only for use with news streams encoded in JSON.

methods.Synopsis: Returns all available ethnicity, housing, population and race information for specified area.

parameters.Name: keypat
parameters.Description: State abbreviation default, or arbitrary placename if keyname=placename

parameters.Name: keyname
parameters.Description: [placename, FIPS, GNIS]

parameters.Name: sumlevid
parameters.Description: 1 = National level, 2 = State level, 3 = County level, 4,6 = City,town level

methods.Synopsis: Returns an area's ethnic data. Information includes how much of the population identifies as Hispanic or non-Hispanic white, and the USA TODAY Diversity Index.

parameters.Name: keypat
parameters.Description: State abbreviation default, or arbitrary placename if keyname=placename

parameters.Name: keyname
parameters.Description: [placename, FIPS, GNIS]

parameters.Name: sumlevid
parameters.Description: 1 = National level, 2 = State level, 3 = County level, 4,6 = City,town level

methods.Synopsis: Returns an area's housing data. Information includes the number of housing units, and the percentage of those that are vacant.

parameters.Name: keypat
parameters.Description: State abbreviation default, or arbitrary placename if keyname=placename

parameters.Name: keyname
parameters.Description: [placename, FIPS, GNIS]

parameters.Name: sumlevid
parameters.Description: 1 = National level, 2 = State level, 3 = County level, 4,6 = City,town level

methods.Synopsis: Returns an area's population data. Information includes the total population of an area, average population per square mile, and the percent by which that population has changed since the last census.

parameters.Name: keypat
parameters.Description: State abbreviation default, or arbitrary placename if keyname=placename

parameters.Name: keyname
parameters.Description: [placename, FIPS, GNIS]

parameters.Name: sumlevid
parameters.Description: 1 = National level, 2 = State level, 3 = County level, 4,6 = City,town level

methods.Synopsis: Returns an area's racial data. Information includes the percentage of an area's population that identifies as White, Black, American Indian, Asian, native Hawaiian/Pacific Islander, or mixed race.

parameters.Name: keypat
parameters.Description: State abbreviation default, or arbitrary placename if keyname=placename

parameters.Name: keyname
parameters.Description: [placename, FIPS, GNIS]

parameters.Name: sumlevid
parameters.Description: 1 = National level, 2 = State level, 3 = County level, 4,6 = City,town level

methods.Synopsis: Method for retrieving the weekly list of the nation's top-selling books as compiled by USA TODAY.

parameters.Name: author
parameters.Description: Filter by name of keyword

parameters.Name: title
parameters.Description: Filter by title of book

parameters.Name: category
parameters.Description: Filter by category (numerical category ID) - [not functional]

parameters.Name: class
parameters.Description: Filter by class - fiction or non-fiction

parameters.Name: count
parameters.Description: Specify the maximum number of books to return

parameters.Name: minyear
parameters.Description: Filter by lower bound year range

parameters.Name: maxyear
parameters.Description: Filter by upper bound year range

parameters.Name: encoding
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

methods.Synopsis: Method for retrieving the nation's top-selling books filtered by date.

parameters.Name: dateFilter
parameters.Description: YYYY or YYYY/MM or YYYY/MM/DD - filter by year, year/month, or year/month/day

parameters.Name: author
parameters.Description: Filter by name of keyword

parameters.Name: title
parameters.Description: Filter by title of book

parameters.Name: category
parameters.Description: Filter by category (numerical category ID) - [not functional]

parameters.Name: class
parameters.Description: Filter by class - fiction or non-fiction

parameters.Name: count
parameters.Description: Specify the maximum number of books to return

parameters.Name: minyear
parameters.Description: Filter by lower bound year range

parameters.Name: maxyear
parameters.Description: Filter by upper bound year range

parameters.Name: encoding
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML
